participant_1.background:
I make sure to spend time with my family after a long day of rehearsals.
my father was a famous actor.
i am bored of my maids.
i have always wanted a pot bellied pig.
My most interesting experience was when I met a famous person who was a passenger in one of my cabs.

participant_2.background:
I have enough money for my needs and wants.
my hobbies include reading and cycling.
I keep up with my family but I am not always sure if they keep up with me.
My most interesting experience was meeting one of my favorite celebrities and getting his autograph when I was growing up in New Hampshire.
I'm looking forward to starting my career and making a difference in the world.

content.text: I'm great, thanks for asking! How are you doing today?
I'm doing well, thank you! I'm just on my way to a rehearsal for my play.
Oh, that's so exciting! What play are you in?
It's called "The Importance of Being Earnest." It's a comedy by Oscar Wilde.
I love Oscar Wilde! I've read some of his books, but I've never seen any of his plays.
You should definitely see it! It's a lot of fun.
I will, thanks for the recommendation!
No problem! So, what do you do for fun?
I like to read, cycle, and spend time with my family.
That's nice! I like to read and spend time with my family too.
Oh, what do you like to read?
I like to read a lot of different things, but I especially like historical fiction and mystery novels.
I love historical fiction too! I'm reading a book right now about the Civil War.
Oh, that sounds interesting! I've never read a book about the Civil War.
It's really good! I'm learning a lot about the history of the war.
Thanks! I'm sure you'd like it too.
